labels.traefik.frontend.headers.contentSecurity: default-src 'none'; object-src 'none'; script-src 'self' analytics.flower.codes; connect-src 'self'; img-src 'self' analytics.flower.codes; style-src 'self' fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' fonts.gstatic.com; frame-ancestors 'self'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self';
